press 5 to see disappointment

AFAIK unless the launch is delayed for several days it will retain the fuel and oxidiser. The oxygen will almost certainly not be kept supercooled and instead allowed to slowly boil off while being replenished continuously. I'm not sure how well insulated the tanks are but my guess is it would lose some 20 to 30% of LOX per day without external cooling or replenishment. They would then probably start chilling it down again and topping it up before the new launch window.

What might require defuelling would be for safety reasons if work needs to be done on the rocket or in its vicinity.

Hey Tim! Your channel is one of the best ^^ I'm guessing you didn't know this, but putting something in three sets of parentheses - like you did with the word "scrub" in the title - happens to be an anti Jewish meme used by conspiracy theorists and white nationalists to imply that someone or something is Jewish. So if you start getting some really weird messages that might be why lol

September 1, 2016

at the SpaceX launch site.

on the Internet. Gone. Ooops.

did not know
that US Launch Alliance
was set up to film
the SpaceX test that day
with a motion picture film camera.
They never gave a thought
that the X-47B
would show up so clearly
in the film images.
Have you ever heard of
anything like this before?
JFK - John McCain Wet Start -
Gulf of Tonkin - 9-11 -
anybody - anyone - Bueller - Bueller.
I like the way you think.
I like the way Trump talks.
Hey - please dismiss the information
I write here real quick.
There are no underground tunnels -
no underground bunker cities -
the new Denver airport
is not designed to look just like
the little airport
George Lucas filmed in
American Graffiti -
there is nothing strange about the
Denver Airport - Area 51 -
Punxsutawney PA on Groundhog Day.

all the other Space Launchers /
every state including Michigan /
Berkshire Hathaway and

all the technology
built into the AMOS 6.

Obama Bad Guys
have never done anything creepy.
Obama is way more of a lover of Jesus

who lives in Allah’s petting zoo barn.
Time to go back to sleep -
nothing to see here -
move along.

crawling on a lens at the launchpad
that looks so much like
a Northrop Grumman X-47B Aircraft.
